content:
# The insertion of 5 iron ore and 5 coal into the stone furnace was successful. 
# The furnace is now working and has produced 1 iron plate, while still having 14 units of coal left as fuel. 

# I currently have the following in my inventory:
# - 2 stone bricks
# - 5 coal
# - 8 stones

# Since the furnace is actively smelting the remaining iron ore, I will wait for a short period to allow it to process the iron ore into iron plates. 
# I will monitor the furnace for the next 30 seconds to check for any additional iron plates produced.

for _ in range(30):
    sleep(1)  # Wait for 1 second intervals
    furnace_info = get_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, Position(-5.0, 5.0))  # Re-check the furnace inventory
    if furnace_info.furnace_source.get('iron-ore', 0) == 0:  # Break if no iron ore is left to smelt
        break

# After waiting, I will check the results stored in the furnace inventory.
final_furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace_info)  # Final check on the furnace inventory.
print(f"Final Furnace Inventory: {final_furnace_inventory}")
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the updated state of entities.
